messageBody:
David Boyer wrote:

> I've almost got one of my team members convinced of the benefits of TDD
> vs. traditional development. The rest of the team has zero interest in
> it. But if I can get one, I might be able to topple the rest. My
> arguments to him consist of the following main points:
>
> <snip>
>
> I'd appreciate any suggestions for arguments or examples to bring to the
> table:
>

Coincidentally, I just posted a blog on my evangelism style...

http://www.clarkware.com/cgi/blosxom/2003/07/29#EvangelizingTDD

All I can say is that it's working well for me.

Mike
